ForcePusle.Title: Pusher
ForcePusle.Text: Designate asteroids with Pushers to push them away from the lighthouse, potentially clearing a path for the ships.

LaserCanon.Title: Cannon
LaserCanon.Text: Use this beam to destroy an asteroid.  You most hold the beam on the asteroid to destroy it.  Careful of nearby ships.

Radar.Title: Radar Beacon
Radar.Text: Designate asteroids with Beacons so that the ships will automatically avoid them.
